thread.title: Richard Holmes
thread.title_full: Full Spectrum Solutions, Inc. reviewed by Richard Holmes

author: Richard Holmes
title: Richard Holmes
text: This was ordered a month ago and we have still heard nothing. Nobody was rude and there has been no friction. There hasn't been anything. If it is not going to be coming anytime soon, an update would at least be nice.
